name: Villa Vieja - Clasico Robusto
additionalNotes: Villa Vieja is a cigar brand created in honor of Estelí, Nicaragua, known for its exceptional quality and rich history. Launched from the Aganorsa factory, it features a unique blend of Estelí tobacco, offering a medium to full body taste and captivating aromas. The brand's collaborative development process involved key industry figures and culminated in its market launch in mid-2022. Embracing Nicaragua's tradition of honoring family legacies, Villa Vieja reflects a commitment to superior craftsmanship and care for all involved in its production, serving as a tribute to the enduring passion for fine tobacco in Estelí.
